name: Samajbook - with Live Cricket Scoring
description: Samaj is an app designed to stay close to communities. Create your community and manage all members, events, posts, matrimony etc. by becoming an admin. Members can post promotions, events, good or sad news.  Key Features: - Live Cricket Scoring for Samaj Cricket Tournaments with inbuilt cricket scorer. - Chat: Samajbook has an internal messenger for sharing text, video and images with other members of community. - Admin posts are separated from member posts. - Categorised posts with likes and comments option. - Events, News, Matrimony, Gallery, Discussions, Greetings, Promotions for all communities in one app. - One app for all communities, trusts or organisations. - SamajBook solves the problem of unnecessary messages piling up on important event news in the communitys groups chat conversations of existing social networking apps.   Last Live Tournament: Mali Premier League - MPL 4  Currently joined and active Samaj: - Mali Saini Samaj of All India, Surat, Chennai, Bangalore , Ajmer, Jaisalmer, Makrana etc. - Rajasthan Rajput Parishad Trust, Chennai - Mewad kshatriya Rajput Samaj - Brahman Samaj, Ahmedabad - Akhil Bhartiya Pareek Samaj, Khorandi - Shri Rajasthani Mali (Saini) Samaj Chennai Trust, Kovoor. - Jain Samaj - Jaat Samaj - Agarwal Samaj - Sirvi Samaj Sampurna Bharat - Maheswari Samaj - Bhoi Samaj Krantidal Seva Trust Gujarat Pradesh - Bhoi Samaj - Kheda & Anand Taluka - SSK Samaj - Somvanshiya Saharsarjuna Kshatriya Samaj - Meghwal Samaj - Anjana Chaudhary Samaj - Anjana Patel Samaj - Koli Samaj - Arya Samaj - Dewasi Raika Samaj - Patidar Samaj - Rajpurohit Samaj - Goswami Samaj - Vah Vancha Barot Samaj - Turi Barot
